'''''Mountains Fall Apart''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series V]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King]] in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* The Indonesian name of the achievement, {{id|Gunung-Gunung Pun Beranjak}}, may be a reference to the Indonesian version of the bible verse {{w|id:Yesaya 54#Ayat 10|Isaiah 54:10}}. The verse is also the source of inspiration for many well-known Indonesian Christian songs.
